umbrella_racing.title: The Flying Umbrella Racing League
umbrella_racing.description: Learn to soar through the skies and face your fears

story1.title: The Big Discovery
story1.description: A mysterious invitation arrives to join the Flying Umbrella Racing League.
story1.key_message: It's normal to feel worried about new things. Taking small steps can help us feel brave!

practice.title: Understanding Our Worries
practice.description: Let's explore how different situations make us feel by moving the slider to show how worried you feel about each situation.

scenarios.text: How worried do you feel about trying something new for the first time?
How do you feel when you have to speak in front of others?
How worried do you feel when meeting new friends?
How do you feel when you make a mistake?
How worried do you feel right now?

story2.title: Special Flying Technique's
story2.description: Learning to fly isn't easy, but that's okay.
story2.key_message: Everyone makes mistakes when learning something new. What matters is that we keep trying!

scenarios.text: How do you feel when things don't go as planned?
What helps you stay calm in difficult situations?

story3.title: Meeting Our Control Centre
story3.description: Sometimes the best support comes from unexpected places.
story3.key_message: Everyone needs help sometimes. Asking for help shows courage and helps us grow stronger!

scenarios.text: How do you feel about asking for help?

story4.title: The Big Race Qualifiers
story4.description: It's not about winning, it's about believing in yourself.
story4.key_message: Success isn't just about winning. It's about trying your best and learning from each experience!

scenarios.text: How do you feel about your journey so far?
